sect2.title: Installing Kernel Module Package for PCIe based GPUs
sect2.para: For PCIe based GPU generations starting with Turing microarchitecture Open Source kernel drivers are available. Besides discrete GPUs this also covers the integrated GPU on Grace Hopper but not the integrated GPUs on Jetson and IGX.
SLES 15 SP5 and later include a SUSE-signed supported KMP.

sect2.title: Installing proprietary kernel drivers for older PCIe based GPUs
sect2.para: For GPU generations of Volta microarchitecture and earlier no fully Open Source kernel drivers are available.
